name: OpenBEL Development Overview
tagline: code contribution and development communication guidelines, etc
body:
### Welcome to OpenBEL Development

### Contributing Code
Clone the repository that you are changing and submit a PR (Pull Request).  *We will need to insure that a CLA (Contributor License Agreement) has been submitted prior to accepting the PR.*  You can submit the CLA by following the instructions at https://github.com/OpenBEL/cla/CONTRIBUTING.adoc

### Communication Tips
* For bugs and suggested enhancements, please add an issue to the specific repository.
* For quick coding support, please use our Gitter Channel: https://gitter.im/OpenBEL/
* For enhancements and proposed changes that are larger than a single issue in a repository, please post a Discussion topic to the Google Group for OpenBEL: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/openbel-discuss

### Maintainers
* @abargnesi, Anthony Bargnesi
* @nbargnesi, Nick Bargnesi
* @wshayes, William Hayes

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with anything related to OpenBEL Github?  Use the [Gitter channel](https://gitter.im/OpenBEL/) or the [OpenBEL Google Group](https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/openbel-discuss)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
